description: I share a lot of recipes with friends and clients. This is easy to use and has all the features I need. Recommended.

Import from the web and a file doesn't work because there is not plugin it says even though it is marked as active. I tried to fix it but now it can't even check it anymore because it needs some python stuff. Guess i'll just save my recipes online, this OS has no recipe programs that work right. This app does work though if you just want to save recipes with no extra features but a text file will do that

I'm honestly not sure why this app is rated so low. It's very clean and easy to use, and I can export my recipes to a file in order to share them between my PC and my laptop. Very handy! And to think I kept all my recipes in a soggy little notebook...

Alles drin, was man braucht. Export in pdf etc. möglich zur Archivierung oder zum Versenden. Schön wäre noch eine komplette, deutsche Übersetzung und die komplette Anzeige der Quell-URL bei pdf-Exporten.
Se cuelga en muchas de sus opciones, por lo menos en mi sistema, Ubuntu 18.04.
